original_text: After those 40 days and nights, the Lord gave me the two flat stones. They had his covenant on them.
korean_text: 사십 주 사십 야를 지난 후에 여호와께서 내게 돌판 곧 언약의 두 돌판을 주시고

sentences.original_text: the Lord gave me the two flat stones
sentences.korean_translation: 주님께서 내게 두 개의 평평한 돌판을 주셨다

sentences.original_text: They had his covenant on them
